home.checkInDescription: Check in with yourself — it's the first step to self-care! Do it everyday.

checkInInfo.title: Why daily check-in matters?
checkInInfo.content:
Daily check-in is a simple yet powerful tool for improving your mental health. Here's why it's important:

• Self-awareness: Regular emotional check-ins help you better understand your feelings and reactions

• Early detection: Allows you to notice mood changes before they become serious problems

• Care habit: Forms a beneficial habit of paying attention to your psychological state

• Progress tracking: Helps track changes in your emotional state over time

• Motivation: Understanding your emotions is the first step to managing them and improving your quality of life

Just a few minutes a day can significantly impact your overall well-being.
